body.p:
Paducah Jany 3d/61
Hon
B Magoffin
Frankfort
Dear Sir
That no trouble may ensue I write asking you for a commission as Notary Public being a member of the Bar I am at some inconvenience, at times getting my Cliants Sworn to legal pleadings --
My References, for all thats required are Judges Williams, Bigger, , and also John Q A King A. P. Thompson, Trinden L McHenry & othersDalliam
Comply at your earliest convenience Obliging

Yours with Respect:
Josiah Harris Jr

McCracken Co
Notary
Josiah Harris Jr
Is Jany 10. 1861
